text: The 2015 FC Okzhetpes season is the club's first season back in the Kazakhstan Premier League, the highest tier of association football in Kazakhstan, and 19th in total. Okzhetpes will also take part in the Kazakhstan Cup. ==Squad== ==Transfers== ===Winter=== In: Out: ===Summer=== In: Out: ==Competitions== ===Kazakhstan Premier League=== ====First round==== =====Results summary===== =====Results by round===== =====Results===== ===== League table ===== ====Relegation Round==== =====Results summary===== =====Results by round===== =====Results===== ===== League table ===== ===Kazakhstan Cup=== ==Squad statistics== ===Appearances and goals=== |- |colspan="14"|Players away from Okzhetpes on loan: |- |colspan="14"|Players who appeared for Okzhetpes that left during the season: |} ===Goal scorers=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%; text-align: center;" |- !width=60|Place !width=60|Position !width=60|Nation !width=60|Number !width=150|Name !width=100|Premier League !width=100|Kazakhstan Cup !width=80|Total |- |1 ||FW||||45||Luka Rotković||13||2||15 |- |2 ||FW||||10||Alibek Buleshev||8||0||8 |- |3 ||FW||||26||Dmitri Sychev||3||0||3 |- |rowspan="3"|4 ||MF||||11||Vitali Volkov||2||0||2 |- ||FW||||28||Sergey Gridin||2||0||2 |- ||MF||||7 ||Ruslan Sakhalbayev||1||1||2 |- |rowspan="8"|7 ||MF||||17||Alyaksandr Pawlaw||1||0||1 |- ||MF||||21||Joseph Di Chiara||1||0||1 |- ||DF||||6 ||Ilnur Mangutkin||1||0||1 |- ||MF||||17||Alyaksandr Pawlaw||1||0||1 |- ||MF||||29||Ivan Cvetković||1||0||1 |- ||DF||||23||Miras Tuliyev||1||0||1 |- ||MF||||27||Pavel Shabalin||1||0||1 |- ||DF||||3 ||Yegor Azovskiy||0||1||1 |- |colspan="4"| |TOTALS |36||4||40 |} ===Disciplinary record=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- | rowspan="2" style="width:5%; text-align:center;"|Number | rowspan="2" style="width:5%; text-align:center;"|Nation | rowspan="2" style="width:5%; text-align:center;"|Position | rowspan="2" style="width:20%; text- align:center;"|Name | colspan="2" style="text-align:center;"|Premier League | colspan="2" style="text-align:center;"|Kazakhstan Cup | colspan="2" style="text-align:center;"|Total |- !
